name: AnimalInfo
0:
”Alexa, open animal info”
”I need info for dog”
”Alexa, open animal info and tell me about dog”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal info
des:
This application will give you brief information about any animal you can think of. This application will also gives you freedom to work with any Alexa enabled device. It will customized its services based on type of your device.

This application will work best with echo spot, echo show and fire tv.

It is currently providing brief introduction on Animal of your choice, its photo, its sound and some fun facts about that animal in most immersive and delightful way.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
